member.name: T:iText.Svg.Converter.SvgConverter
member.summary: This is the main container class for static methods that do high-level conversion operations from input to PDF, either by drawing on a canvas or by returning an XObject, which can then be used by the calling class for further processing and drawing operations.

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Converter.SvgConverter.ConvertToXObject(System.String,iText.Kernel.Pdf.PdfDocument)
member.summary:
Converts a String containing valid SVG content to an XObject that can then be used on the passed
. This method does NOT manipulate the
in any way. This method (or its overloads) is the best method to use if you want to reuse the same SVG image multiple times on the same
. If you want to reuse this object on other
instances, please either use any of the
overloads in this same class and convert its result to an XObject with
, or look into using
.
member.param: the String value containing valid SVG content
member.returns: a XObject containing the PDF instructions corresponding to the passed SVG content

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Converter.SvgConverter.ConvertToXObject(iText.Svg.Renderers.ISvgNodeRenderer,iText.Kernel.Pdf.PdfDocument)
member.summary: This method draws a NodeRenderer tree to a canvas that is tied to the passed document.
member.remarks:
This method draws a NodeRenderer tree to a canvas that is tied to the passed document. This method (or its overloads) is the best method to use if you want to reuse the same SVG image multiple times on the same
. If you want to reuse this object on other
instances, please either use any of the
overloads in this same class and convert its result to an XObject with
, or look into using
.
member.param:
the
instance that contains the renderer tree
the document that the returned XObject can be drawn on (on any given page coordinates)
member.returns: an XObject containing the PDF instructions corresponding to the passed node renderer tree.

to allow customizability in client code, and dependency injection in tests.

member.name: T:iText.Svg.Renderers.SvgDrawContext
member.summary:
The SvgDrawContext keeps a stack of
instances, which represent all levels of XObjects that are added to the root canvas.

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Renderers.SvgDrawContext.GetCurrentCanvas
member.summary: Retrieves the current top of the stack, without modifying the stack.
member.returns: the current canvas that can be used for drawing operations.

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Renderers.SvgDrawContext.PopCanvas
member.summary: Retrieves the current top of the stack, thereby taking the current item off the stack.
member.returns: the current canvas that can be used for drawing operations.

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Renderers.SvgDrawContext.PushCanvas(iText.Kernel.Pdf.Canvas.PdfCanvas)
member.summary:
Adds a
to the stack (by definition its top), for use in drawing operations.
member.param: the new top of the stack

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Renderers.SvgDrawContext.Size
member.summary: Get the current size of the stack, signifying the nesting level of the XObjects.
member.returns: the current size of the stack.

member.name: T:iText.Svg.Utils.SvgCssUtils
member.summary: Utility class that facilitates parsing values from CSS.

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.SvgCssUtils.SplitValueList(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a given String into a list of substrings.
member.remarks: Splits a given String into a list of substrings. The string is split up by commas and whitespace characters (\t, \n, \r, \f).
member.returns: a list containing the split strings, an empty list if the value is null or empty

member.name: T:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils
member.summary: Utility class responsible for converting Strings containing transformation declarations into AffineTransform objects.
member.remarks: Utility class responsible for converting Strings containing transformation declarations into AffineTransform objects. This class only supports the transformations as described in the SVG specification: - matrix - rotate - scale - skewX - skewY - translate

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.MATRIX
member.summary: Keyword for matrix transformations.
member.remarks: Keyword for matrix transformations. Accepts 6 values. matrix(0 1 2 3 4 5)

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.ROTATE
member.summary: Keyword for rotation transformation.
member.remarks: Keyword for rotation transformation. Accepts either 1 or 3 values. In the case of 1 value, x and y are assumed to be the origin of the user space. rotate(angle x y) rotate(angle)

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.SCALE
member.summary: Keyword for scale transformation.
member.remarks: Keyword for scale transformation. Accepts either 1 or 2 values. In the case of 1 value, the second value is assumed to be the same as the first one. scale(x y) scale(x)

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.SKEWX
member.summary: Keyword for skewX transformation.
member.remarks: Keyword for skewX transformation. Accepts 1 value. skewX(angle)

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.SKEWY
member.summary: Keyword for skewY transformation.
member.remarks: Keyword for skewY transformation. Accepts 1 value. skewY(angle)

member.name: F:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.TRANSLATE
member.summary: Keyword for translate transformation.
member.remarks: Keyword for translate transformation. Accepts either 1 or 2 values. In the case of 1 value, the y value is assumed to be 0. translate(x y) translate(x)

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.ParseTransform(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string containing a transform declaration into an AffineTransform object.
member.remarks: Converts a string containing a transform declaration into an AffineTransform object. This class only supports the transformations as described in the SVG specification: - matrix - translate - skewx - skewy - rotate - scale
member.returns: the AffineTransform object

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.SplitString(System.String)
member.summary: A transformation attribute can encompass multiple transformation operation (e.g.
member.remarks: A transformation attribute can encompass multiple transformation operation (e.g. "translate(10,20) scale(30,40)". This method splits the original transformation string into multiple strings so that they can be handled separately.
member.returns: a list containing strings describing a single transformation operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.TransformationStringToMatrix(System.String)
member.summary: This method decides which transformation operation the given transformation strings maps onto.
member.returns: the mapped AffineTransform object

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateSkewYTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a skewY transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the skew operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateSkewXTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a skewX transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the skew operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateRotationTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a rotate transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the rotate operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateScaleTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a scale transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the scale operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateTranslateTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a translate transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the translate operation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.CreateMatrixTransformation(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a matrix transformation.
member.returns: AffineTransform for the matrix keyword

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.GetNameFromString(System.String)
member.summary: This method extracts the transformation name given a transformation.
member.returns: the name of the transformation

member.name: M:iText.Svg.Utils.TransformUtils.GetValuesFromTransformationString(System.String)
member.summary: This method extracts the values from a transformation.
member.returns: values of the transformation
